title: can you scrubs stop banning zed?
body: Bronzies do no understand how to counter him or dodge his shurikans while they assume he has great poke and infinite poking, since he uses energy, hes also one of the hardest champs to play he must land in every single shurikan for his ult at late game while they are easy as fuck to dodge, and dies easily, while in laning he gets high risk and low reward when diving in with his ult. So shut the hell up scrubs
